city.name: Cape Town Mother City
city.description: Cape Town is home to some of the most beautiful beaches on the planet. The city straddles the freezing Atlantic Ocean and the slightly warmer Indian Ocean, so your choice of beach may be determined by how badly you want to swim. Famous for its sun, sea and scenery, Cape Town is a beloved tourist destination for visitors the world over. Therefore, no surprise that this coastal gem has been voted the best city in the world seven-years-running!

phrases.englishPhrase: You must be the change you wish to see in the world
phrases.foreignLanguage: Devi essere il cambiamento che desideri vedere nel mondo'

phrases.englishPhrase: Any idiot can build a bridge that stands, but it takes an engineer to build a bridge that barely stands
phrases.foreignLanguage: Qualsiasi idiota pu√≤ costruire un ponte che sta in piedi, ma ci vuole un ingegnere per costruire un ponte che sta in piedi a malapena.

phrases.englishPhrase: Scientists dream about doing great things. Engineers do them.
phrases.foreignLanguage: Gli scienziati sognano di fare grandi cose. Gli ingegneri li fanno.

favouriteSubjects.name: Transportation Engineering
favouriteSubjects.description: A branch of civil engineering that involves the planning, design, operation, and maintenance of transportation systems to help build smart, safe, and livable communities.

favouriteSubjects.name: Geotechnical Engineering
favouriteSubjects.description: The study of the behaviour of soils under the influence of loading forces and soil-water interactions.

favouriteSubjects.name: Structural Analysis
favouriteSubjects.description: Structural analysis is the process of calculating and determining the effects of loads and internal forces on a structure, building or object.

favouriteSubjects.name: Project Management
favouriteSubjects.description: The process of leading the work of a team to achieve all project goals within the given constrain.

favouriteSubjects.name: Contract Management
favouriteSubjects.description: The process of managing agreements, from their creation to their execution by the chosen party and the eventual termination of the contract.

favouriteSubjects.name: Autodesk Civil 3D
favouriteSubjects.description: A civil engineering design and documentation solution that supports Building Information Modeling (BIM) workflows on a variety of civil infrastructure project types, including roads and highways, land development, rail, airports, and water.

footer.thanks: Gratitude to you customers for taking your time to visit the webpage
footer.description: Feel free to visit the webpage again
